attributes.action: Stop Council Tax in England, Wales & Northern Ireland During COVID19 Outbreak
attributes.background: We call on the Government or Parliament to consider stopping Council Tax payments for an appropriate amount of time amidst COVID19 particularly for people on low incomes and the self-employed etc. Many will feel that they have to work to pay bills and Council Tax and thus risk spreading the virus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
